resources.string: The Wi-Fi+ service helps you intelligently choose between Wi-Fi and mobile data. This service will obtain your location using nearby base stations and access points, and then automatically turn Wi-Fi on or off. Wi-Fi+ also evaluates available Wi-Fi hotspots and makes intelligent recommendations. For certain free Wi-Fi hotspots, Wi-Fi+ will automatically obtain the verification code from incoming SMS messages and log in to the network via your browser (only supported in China). Enable this service?

The WLAN+ service helps you intelligently choose between WLAN and mobile data. This service will obtain your location using nearby base stations and access points, and then automatically turn WLAN on or off. WLAN+ also evaluates available WLAN hotspots and makes intelligent recommendations. For certain free WLAN hotspots, WLAN+ will automatically obtain the verification code from incoming SMS messages and log in to the network via your browser (only supported in China). Enable this service?

The Wi-Fi+ service helps you intelligently choose between Wi-Fi and mobile data. This service will obtain your location using nearby base stations and access points, and then automatically turn Wi-Fi on or off. Wi-Fi+ also evaluates available Wi-Fi hotspots and makes intelligent recommendations. Enable this service?

The WLAN+ service helps you intelligently choose between WLAN and mobile data. This service will obtain your location using nearby base stations and access points, and then automatically turn WLAN on or off. WLAN+ also evaluates available WLAN hotspots and makes intelligent recommendations. Enable this service?

Huawei Club is the only official communication platform of Huawei. You can find information about the latest Huawei products and services, ROM resources, games, etc., and participate in a number of online and offline interactive activities. Huawei Club is Huawei\'s window to you.
Prevent others from using this phone without your permission by activating device protection features.

Device protection is automatically activated when you add a Google Account and set a screen lock style. Together with Android Device Manager, you can locate and erase your phone, and protect it from reuse if it\'s lost or stolen.\n\nEven if your phone gets wiped, your Google Account password will be required before anyone can use this phone.
Your screen lock style has been set up successfully.
Device protection features will not be activated. You won\'t be able to prevent others from using this phone if it\'s lost, stolen or wiped.
You are now a normal user of this phone.

1. Please only share your phone with people you trust.
2. The owner can uninstall your apps and delete your data.
3. Other users can update your apps.
4. Some features will not be available to you and will be grayed out on the interface.
The beta version you\'re using requires Internet access to continue. Thank you for your cooperation.
Please connect to the Internet first.
The beta version you\'re using requires that you log in or register a Huawei ID to continue. Thank you for your cooperation.
The beta version you\'re using requires that you log in or register a Google account to continue. Thank you for your cooperation.
The beta version you\'re using requires that you set a screen lock method to continue. Thank you for your cooperation.

Please read the following content carefully before using your Huawei device. Using any Huawei device indicates your acknowledgement and agreement to Huawei\'s Terms & Conditions. If you recently purchased a Huawei product and do not agree to Huawei\'s Terms & Conditions, you may return your Huawei device to an official Huawei retailer or authorized reseller for a refund, provided that you abide by the terms of Huawei\'s returns policy. Touch here to view the End User License Agreement and Huawei\'s returns policy.

To provide a better user experience, the harassment filter and do not disturb features will access your contacts, messages, and call log. The collection, use, and storage of this data is governed by the provisions in the End User License Agreement.
Participate in user experience improvement plan
You can customize this device to your needs. These accessibility features can be changed later from Settings.

HiBoard is located on the left side of your home screen. It aggregates the search and Smartcare features and shows you content that may interest you, including news, lifestyle services, music, and videos. HiBoard needs to connect to the Internet, and access to your Huawei ID, IMEI, and location.
Weather needs to use the Location and Phone permissions (find nearby base stations for assisted positioning) to obtain your current location, and provide weather forecast information.
For third-party apps you have installed, EMUI will intelligently configure permissions, including Storage, Location, Phone, Camera, SMS, Contacts, and Microphone.
You can also go to Settings > Apps to configure individual app permissions, or manually configure permissions from Phone Manager > Permission manager.

Smartcare provides travel management, work reminders, contact birthday reminders, traffic information, and other services. It needs to access the Internet, and the following information will also be collected and processed:
Device information, including IMEI, IMSI, and MEID.
Personal information, including your location, contacts, messages, calendar, fitness records, sleep records, and usage behaviors.
You can exit Smartcare to terminate the information collection and upload activities described above.
This app needs to send some of the above information to a third party in order to provide you with related services.
Auto-update magazine unlock images over Wi-Fi
Auto-update magazine unlock images over WLAN

Magazine unlock will regularly update the lock screen image to add a visual element to your experience. In order to provide you with the latest images, magazine unlock will automatically update when connected to Wi-Fi. You can disable image updates in magazine unlock settings.

Magazine unlock will regularly update the lock screen image to add a visual element to your experience. In order to provide you with the latest images, magazine unlock will automatically update when connected to WLAN. You can disable image updates in magazine unlock settings.

To provide better services to you, your device may send information about you and your device to your carrier over Wi-Fi or mobile data. The carrier promises to use the related information for the sole purpose of improving service quality or providing customized services or technology. Your information will not be disclosed in any form that allows your personal identity to be identified.

To provide better services to you, your device may send information about you and your device to your carrier over WLAN or mobile data. The carrier promises to use the related information for the sole purpose of improving service quality or providing customized services or technology. Your information will not be disclosed in any form that allows your personal identity to be identified.
To provide complete services, Google Play requires access to the Internet as well as your contacts and location information.

· Do not use non-standard SIM cards. Doing so may damage your phone.\n· By default, the lower slot is used for the primary SIM card (for 4G/3G/2G) and the upper slot is used for the secondary SIM card (for 2G only). You can change these settings from Settings > Dual SIM management.\n· Turn off your phone before inserting or removing a SIM card.
Cloud management of your photos, contacts and other data, the ultimate safe storage; \n One-key machine backup, easy replacement; \n Position the device at any time, remotely search.
This software needs to send some of the above information to a third-party service provider, and the third party provides you with the appropriate services.

To provide better service, your device may periodically send information about you and this device to selected service providers via Wi-Fi or mobile data networks. Operators promise to analyze only relevant information for improving service quality or providing customized services or technologies, and will not disclose relevant information to outsiders in any form that can identify you personally.

Huawei Mobile Services is the basic service provided by your Huawei account, Huawei payment, and Huawei push. Huawei\'s own applications and third-party applications will use Huawei mobile services to log in, pay for and receive messages. During use, you need to connect to the network, use the storage and phone rights, and allow your device to receive notification messages from Huawei Mobile Services.

The magazine lock screen regularly updated the beautiful lock screen picture, lit the screen and surprise. In order to provide basic services, the magazine lock screen needs to connect to the network and automatically update the lock screen image under WLAN connection. Under the mobile network, it will not be updated automatically. When you manually update your lock screen image, you may incur traffic charges that will be charged directly by the operator. In order to provide you with personalized lock screen content services, you need to obtain your device information (IMEI, MAC, Android ID, MEID, model), network information (network connection status), and picture usage information (channel subscription, picture display, view Details, favorites, and deletion records are used to identify the device and provide personalized content (may include advertisements). The above data usage follows the end-user license agreement.
Huawei, glory settings, and Huawei backup work
suitable for Samsung, Sony, HTC and other devices
Is it set to a new device?
Later you can go to \"Settings\">\"System\">\"Data Migration\" to restore your personal data.
touch fingerprint sensor replaces the corresponding function of the screen (no need to enter the fingerprint)
caller interface long press fingerprint sensor to answer the phone
long press the fingerprint sensor in the camera viewfinder to shoot
alarm bell interface long press the fingerprint sensor to stop the alarm
On the fingerprint sensor, the finger slides down to display the system notification panel, double-click on the empty notification, and slide it up.
When viewing the picture in full screen, swipe left and right on the fingerprint sensor to switch the image
Use fingerprint instead of password to verify or pay (print fingerprint)
Allows fingerprint unlocking when the screen is locked and the screen is closed
Allow fingerprint access to the safe cabinet
Allows fingerprints to access application locks and locked applications
open the payment screen when the screen or lock screen
Please set the lock screen password before enabling fingerprints
The lock screen password is used to unlock the phone and must be unlocked using a password in the following cases:
·Unlocked without a password in three days

The fingerprint function needs to be used with the password unlocking method. If you do not create a lock screen password, you will not be able to complete the fingerprint entry and enable the fingerprint function.
